Html: I'm really having a hard time figuring out how to actually get the item filter to only show items up to a certain iLvl in the menus when I click on a slot to show potential upgrades.  I don't care to see 277 gear that I will in all likelihood never get my hands on.  Is there any way someone could post more detailed instructions or direct me to a link that has such instructions in them?  The Item Filtering portion of the Documentation does not adequately instruct how to do this.  Thanks.

Top Right portion of the screen, there is a "Filters" dropdown.  What you're looking for is in the "Disable by Item Level" -- expand that, and then check "Disable 277+".  That will make it so no 277+ items show up.

Most of the other filters are "Enable" filters.  So, if you only want to see Icecrown loot, uncheck the Tier7-9, Heroics, etc, and only have the Tier10 filter checked.

Thank you SO much.  Never really even looked there, was always checking under Tools - Edit Item Filters thinking that would do it.  

 

<3
